mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where noticetop=1 and (noticetype=#{user} or noticetype=3)
select count(*) from notice where noticetop=1
select count(*) from notice where noticetype=#{type} or noticetype=3
select * from notice where noticetop=1 order by noticeidx desc
select * from notice where noticetop=1 and (noticetype=#{type} or noticetype=3) order by noticeidx desc
select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select * from notice order by noticetop desc, noticeidx desc) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select * from notice where noticetop=0 and (noticetype=#{type} or noticetype=3) order by noticeidx desc) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
